EmailTemplate.name: File Batch Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: Batch {!FileBatch__c.Name} created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!FileBatch__c.CreatedBy},
This email is to notify you that Batch {!FileBatch__c.Name} for {!FileBatch__c.RecordType} pathway has been created.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the Utah Grants Support Team at utahgrants.support@reisystems.com, if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
utahgrants.support@reisystems.com
Ph. No. 703.480.9100
